Plot: Dirty Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.
Title: The Dead Pool
Writer: Harry Julian Fink (characters), Rita M. Fink (characters), Steve Sharon (story), Durk Pearson (story), Sandy Shaw (story), Steve Sharon (screenplay)
Actors: Clint Eastwood, Patricia Clarkson, Liam Neeson, Evan C. Kim
